https://tmrev.io/movie/575722-A Little Princess 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mjJoSlFLXRUs6HoXLXa5mv2yv61.jpg Mal-soon is a tough granny in a shanty town in Busan. In front of her, 12-year-old Gong-ju appears with her baby sister Jin-ju on her back. Gong-ju claims that she is the daughter of Mal-soon’s runaway daughter. Mal-soon’s peaceful life becomes a mess with these little strangers, but Mal-soon doesn’t feel bad living with them. A Little Princess
